#text=One weekend , my partner and I decided to take a weekday trip up to Seattle .
#text=We purchased tickets online immediately after a quick breakfast .
#text=After deciding what parts of Seattle to visit , we drove over to Amtrak station and parked in a spot allowed for the day .
#text=The boarding process was very simple , the train was also a lot cleaner than we thought !
#text=We had grilled cheese sandwiches from a menu handed to us , they were delicious .
#text=It took barely a few hours to get there , so we decided to look out the window at the scenery most of the time .
#text=None of us became sick , which was another one of our worries .
#text=The staff on the train were exceptionally nice , and offered us snacks on occasion .
#text=The train was a great idea for the trip we had planned .
#text=It was much nicer than driving up the interstate .
